titleStmt.title: Berlin, Staatsbibliothek zu Berlin, gr.2" Zu 5956

respStmt.resp: Edited by Michael Marx in collaboration with Tobias J. Jocham et. al. TEI version created by Yasmin Faghihi and Huw Jones

availability.p: Image credits: Roxburgh- Writing the Word of God (S. 10-11).

summary.p: 353 fol. on parchment; Shelfmark: gr.2" Zu 5956; Qurʾānic Text: Q 2:7-43:11 (incomplete); 9-12 lines per page; Dimensions: 680 x 530mm.

The images shown of this monumental Qurʾanic codex, which is now kept in Tashkent, are from the facsimile edition of 1905 (ed. W. Ouspensky/S. Pissaref). The illustration shows the copy of the State Library, shelfmark gr.2" Zu 5956.
The codex was first described in detail by the Russian orientalist Aleksej F. Shebunin (cf. Shebunin 1892), a lot of further information was provided by A.Jeffery and I. Mendelssohn (1942).

l.note: حرف س با كسر يك دندانه

حرف س با يك دندانه اضافه

حرف س با يك دندانه اضافه

وَمَا هُوَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ (افزوده شده با دست خط ديگر خارج از سطر اصلى)
ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ | حرف س با يك دندانه اضافه
